item.title: Safe-zone
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Ok, well, you’ll see something like this:

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3039 && absX <= 3111 && absY >= 3475 && absY <=3523 ) || (absX >= 2790 && absX <= 2855 && absY >= 3418 && absY <=3466 ) || (absX >= 2584 && absX <= 2612 && absY >= 3153 && absY <=3169 ) || (absX >= 2935 && absX <= 3066 && absY >= 2935 && absY <= 3399 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >=2747 && absX <=2758 && absY >=2794 && absY <=2802 ) || (absX >=2764 && absX <=2776 && absY >=2793 && absY <=2802 ) || (absX >=2773 && absX <=2780 && absY >=2766 && absY <=2770 ) || (absX >=2751 && absX <=2770 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2777 ) || (absX >=2785 && absX <=2809 && absY >=2771 && absY <=2801 ) || (absX >=2732 && absX <=2740 && absY >=2789 && absY <=2796 ) || (absX >=2861 && absX <=2872 && absY >=10186 && absY <=10212 ) || (absX >=3409 && absX <=3452 && absY >=3532 && absY <=3575 ) || (absX >=2435 && absX <=2447 && absY >=3080 && absY <=3099 ) || (absX >=3267 && absX <=3332 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3270 ) || (absX >=3151 && absX <=3182 && absY >=3220 && absY <=3272 ) || (absX >=3032 && absX <=3063 && absY >=3424 && absY <=3457 ) || (absX >=3476 && absX <=3501 && absY >=9483 && absY <=9505 ) || (absX >=2942 && absX <=2992 && absY >=3390 && absY <=3414 ) || (absX >=2420 && absX <=2431 && absY >=3072 && absY <=3083 ) || (absX >=3071 && absX <=3122 && absY >=3456 && absY <=3523 ) || (absX >=3101 && absX <=3124 && absY >=9825 && absY <=9849 ) || (absX >=2585 && absX <=2605 && absY >=3153 && absY <=3169 ) || (absX >=2853 && absX <=2926 && absY >=3530 && absY <=3577 ) || (absX >=2579 && absX <=2622 && absY >=3841 && absY <=3902 ) || (absX >=2887 && absX <=2699 && absY >=2939 && absY <=2741 ) || (absX >=2742 && absX <=2815 && absY >=3146 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=2692 && absX <=2810 && absY >=2690 && absY <=2808 ) || (absX >= 2437 && absX <=2446 && absY >= 3082 && absY <=3098 ) ||(absX >= 2805 && absX <=2878 && absY >= 3222 && absY <=3313 )|| (absX >= 2320 && absX <= 2349 && absY >= 3160 && absY <=3185 ) || (absX >= 3293 && absX <= 3310 && absY >= 3474 && absY <=3492 ) || (absX >= 2695 && absX <= 2726 && absY >= 3704 && absY <=3731 ) || (absX >= 2594 && absX <= 2611 && absY >= 4772 && absY <=4778 ) || (absX >= 3548 && absX <= 3577 && absY >= 3277 && absY <=3306 ) || (absX >= 2530 && absX <= 2546 && absY >= 4712 && absY <=4722 ) || (absX >= 3217 && absX <= 3241 && absY >= 2830 && absY <=2854 ) || (absX >= 2824 && absX <= 2937 && absY >= 9805 && absY <=9851 ) || (absX >= 2993 && absX <= 3004 && absY >= 3932 && absY <=3964 ) || (absX >= 2256 && absX <=2287 && absY >=4711 && absY <=3098 ) || (absX >= 2256 && absX <=2287 && absY >= 4680 && absY <=4711) || (absX >= 3366 && absX <=3370 && absY >= 3227 && absY <=3239) || (absX >= 3384 && absX <=3386 && absY >= 3226 && absY <=3237) || (absX >= 3027 && absX <=3049 && absY >= 9733 && absY <=9842) || (absX >= 3329 && absX <= 3364 && absY >= 2943 && absY <=3006) || (absX >= 3235 && absX <= 3294 && absY >= 3502 && absY <=3515) || (absX >= 3274 && absX <= 3285 && absY >= 3486 && absY <=3510) || (absX >= 3266 && absX <=3286 && absY >= 3514 && absY <=3521) || (absX >= 2882 && absX <=2937 && absY >= 2795 && absY <=9851) || (absX >= 2857 && absX <=2969 && absY >= 2766 && absY <=9795) || (absX >= 2824 && absX <=2871 && absY >= 9805 && absY <=9852) || (absX >= 2935 && absX <=2889 && absY >= 9772 && absY <=9676) || (absX >= 2592 && absX <=2611 && absY >= 3396 && absY <=3415) || (absX >= 3586 && absX <=2604 && absY >= 3409 && absY <=3425) || (absX >= 2595 && absX <=2604 && absY >= 3420 && absY <=3425) || (absX >= 3351 && absX <=3382 && absY >= 3248 && absY <=3275) || (absX >= 3520 && absX <=3581 && absY >= 9664 && absY <=9723) || (absX >= 3325 && absX <=3405 && absY >= 3198 && absY <=3286) || (absX >= 2847 && absX <=2921 && absY >= 9894 && absY <=9974) || (absX >= 3273 && absX <=3291 && absY >= 2757 && absY <=2784) || (absX >= 3348 && absX <=3377 && absY >= 3391 && absY <=3432) || (absX >= 3214 && absX <=3244 && absY >= 3422 && absY <=3454) || (absX >= 3461 && absX <=3518 && absY >= 9470 && absY <=9537) || (absX >= 3241 && absX <=3258 && absY >= 9359 && absY <=9350) || (absX >= 2498 && absX <=2514 && absY >= 4697 && absY <=4712) || (absX >= 2519 && absX <= 2534 && absY >= 4767 && absY <=4787) || (absX >= 2478 && absX <= 3327 && absY >= 2944 && absY <=3517) || (absX >= 2087 && absX <= 2107 && absY >= 4418 && absY <=4438) || (absX >= 2540 && absX <= 2531 && absY >= 4642 && absY <=4658) || (absX >= 3029 && absX <= 3069 && absY >= 3726 && absY <=3768) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Or something close to that.

So, you copy the last one, which would be

|| (absX >= 3029 && absX <= 3069 && absY >= 3726 && absY <=3768) ||

And you change the coords, so you kind of make a square using this…

|| (absX >= Xcoord1 && absX <= Xcoord2 && absY >= Ycoord1 && absY <=Ycoord2) ||

You go to the futhest south east of the area you want to be safe, and right in the Xcoord1, and Ycoord1.
Then you go to the furthest north-east, and type in the Xcoord2, and Ycoord2, hope it helped.

item.title: Safe-zone
item.dc:creator: @Austin2 -Austin-
item.description:
@Austin2 wrote:

theres tons of codes like this || (absX >= 2401 && absX <= 2405 && absY >= 3098 && absY <= 3102) ok the 2401 is the southwest x cord and the 3098 is the southwest y cord. then the 2405 and 3102 is the northeast cord’s , just add a code like that and put the cords in of ur southwest and northeast, should work

item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Search “nonwild” in your client.java, i can’t really help you much more, because it takes a bit of effort to explain it, you should be able to work your way from what i told you to search.
